alert.note: Alert for Huron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 3:19AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Huron County through 415 AM EDT... At 318 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Au Gres to 9 miles west of Caseville to near Owendale. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Caseville and Elkton around 325 AM EDT. Bad Axe around 330 AM EDT. Kinde around 340 AM EDT. Port Austin around 345 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Redman, Parisville, Huron City, White Rock, Ivanhoe, Rapson, Grindstone City, Bay Port, Pinnebog and Ruth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
